product_name: Ocean Kayak Comfort Tech Kayak Seat Back
long_description: The Ocean Kayak Comfort Tech kayak seat back brings deluxe comfort to your sit-on-top kayak. Thick padding offers welcome relief on long day trips. Tough fabric resists the rigors of paddling, and built-in ventilation system cools and helps keep you dry. Adjustable straps on sides let you fine-tune backrest angle for a variety of comfort options. The Ocean Kayak Comfort Tech kayak seat enhances visibility in dim light thanks to its reflective logos.
short_description: The Ocean Kayak Comfort Tech kayak seat back brings deluxe comfort to your sit-on-top kayak.
